English Meaning: 2.1.GWho is constantly engaged in penance and self-study

हिन्दी अर्ध: दूसरों के उपकार को याद रखने वाला
English Meaning: conscious of service done by others
one who is dear to all
one who has conquired over sense organs
having a neck shaped as a conch
whose collar bone covered with flesh
11.2.Gwhose arms extended right upto his knees
2.1.GOne who knows the secret of virtues

5.1.Gknower of the real meaning of the scriptures

पूर्व में कहे गए गुणों से सम्पन्न

English Meaning: with intent to gratify the people
to invest with office of regent
due to his speaking the truth

हिन्दी अर्ध: सुमित्रा की प्रीति को बढाने वाले
English Meaning: one who enhanced the delight of(his mother) Sumitra

English Meaning: stricken with grief at the separation of his son
headed by the sage Vasishtha etc.

हिन्दी अर्ध: राम चरण को प्रसन्न करने के लिए
English Meaning: in order to please the venerable Rama

हिन्दी अर्ध: राम के आने की अभिलाषा से
English Meaning: longing for the return of shri Rama
dwelling in the forest of Dandaka
capable of assuming any form at will
well-versed in the principles of right piousness
and at the intercession of Hanuman
in the presence of (sacred) fire as witness
in the course of that encounter
in the course of that encounter

हिन्दी अर्ध: अशोक वाटिका के प्रवेश द्वार को

English Meaning: in consequence of boon by the missiles
who can bind him in bondage
at the intercession of the sea
from the words of fire god
accompanied by his relations and friends
one who gives pleasure to all
will be ever devoted to their husbands
(will be) full of riches and food grains
involving the use of abundant gold
along with his sons and grand-sons
along with his followers and attendants
